00014 #include "Event.h"

00017 using std::pair;
00018 using std::string;
00019 
00020 
00021 using std::tr1::bind; 
00022 using std::tr1::function;
00023 using std::tr1::hash;
00024 
00025 using std::tr1::unordered_map;
00026 using std::tr1::shared_ptr;
00027 
00028 using namespace std::tr1::placeholders;
00029 
00030 
00031 namespace TenUI {
00032 
00033         class EventDispatcher {
00034                 
00035         /*******************************
00036         *                       Type Defs                  *
00037         ********************************/ 
00038         public:
00039                 typedef const shared_ptr<Event>&                                                                        EventHandlerArgType;
00040                 typedef function< void (EventHandlerArgType) >                                          EventHandlerFuncType;
00041                 
00042         private:
00043                 typedef pair< shared_ptr<EventHandler>, EventHandlerFuncType >          HandlerPairType;
00044                 typedef unordered_map<  shared_ptr<EventHandler>, 
00045                                                                 EventHandlerFuncType, 
00046                                                                 hash_shared_ptr<EventHandler>
00047                                                      >                                                                                          HandlerFuncMap;
00048                 typedef unordered_map< string, HandlerFuncMap, hash<string> >           HandlerMapType;
00049         
00050         
00051         /*******************************
00052         *                 Member Vars              *
00053         ********************************/
00054         private:
00055                 shared_ptr<Event> curEvent;
00056                 function< void (HandlerPairType const &) > dispatchEventFunc;
00057                 HandlerMapType handlers;        
00058                 HandlerFuncMap allEvents_Handlers;
00059                         
00060         /*******************************
00061         *                 Helper Funcs             *
00062         ********************************/
00063         private:
00064                 // Used to create dispatchEventFunc
00065                 void _dispatchEvent( HandlerPairType const &handler );
00066                 
00067         protected:
00068                 void addEventType( const string& );
00069                 void dispatchEvent( shared_ptr<Event> const & );        
00070         
00071                 
00072         /*******************************
00073         *                 Public Funcs             *
00074         ********************************/
00075         public:
00076                 EventDispatcher();
00077                 virtual ~EventDispatcher();
00078                 
00079                 template<class TC>
00080                 void registerAllEventsHandler(void (TC::*f)(EventHandlerArgType), const shared_ptr<TC> & inst) {
00081                         allEvents_Handlers[inst] = bind(f, inst, _1 );
00082                 }
00083                 
00084                 template<class TC>
00085                 void registerHandler(const string& eventType, void (TC::*f)(EventHandlerArgType), const shared_ptr<TC> & inst) {
00086                         HandlerMapType::iterator it = handlers.find(eventType); 
00087                         if( it != handlers.end() ){
00088                                 it->second[inst] = bind(f, inst, _1 );
00089                         }
00090                 }
00091         
00092                 template<class TC>
00093                 void unregisterHandler(const string& eventType, const shared_ptr<TC> & inst) {
00094                         HandlerMapType::iterator it = handlers.find(eventType); 
00095                         if( it != handlers.end() ){
00096                                 handlers[eventType].erase(inst);
00097                         }
00098                 }
00099                         
00100         };
00101 
00102 }

00104 #endif /*EVENTDISPATCHER_H_*/
